NTU1L.VS.summary: Novaturas AB engages in the tour operator and travel agency activities in the Baltic States. The company operates through Flight Package Tours, Sightseeing Tours by Plane, Sightseeing Tours by Coach, and Other segments. It offers summer and winter package holidays, as well as sightseeing tours by coach and aircraft to approximately 30 destinations worldwide. The company also sells flight tickets and hotel accommodations. It offers its products through retail travel agencies and internal sales channels, as well as an e-commerce platform. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Kaunas, Lithuania.
